title: sadguru sadAshiva
sahitya:
sadguru sadAshiva brahmattaip-pOl oru sAdhuvuNDO ivvulagil engaL


anupallavi

  nitya mauni sattiya jnAni shuddha sutantara samarasa jyOti


caraNam    sahaja samAdhiyilE sancaritta dhIran sakala uyirgaLukkum upakAran
ahamukha guhaiyilE sukham uDan amarndu shuddhAnandam AgiyadAnandamillAda
